title: Exploring the Perspectives of Older Adults on a Digital Brain Health Platform Using Natural Language Processing: Cohort Study
details: H Ding, K Gifford, LC Shih, K Ho, S Rahman, A Igwe… - JMIR Formative Research, 2024
abstract: Background: Although digital technology represents a growing field aiming to revolutionize early Alzheimer disease risk prediction and monitoring, the perspectives of older adults on an integrated digital brain health platform have not …
